AUTHOR: Young
DESCRIPTION: Allows for music to be played through your bot in a voice channel.
NAME: Audio
INSTALL_MSG:
This a new and improved Audio cog! It will not work with the one that comes with RedBot by default!

**Some things that have been changed**
`1)` Play command supports playlist links.
`2)` Embeded command messages.
`3)` Updating now playing message when the next song plays.

More will be added and changed down the road so stay tuned for updates.
